schema.title: Markeplace Embeddable
schema.description: Configurations for publishing this marketplace ADO App into an embeddable.

marketplace.title: Marketplace Address
marketplace.description: Enter the address of the Marketplace component you wish to display in your embeddable.

cw721.title: CW721 Address
cw721.description: Enter the address of the CW721 component which minted the specific CW721 NFT Token(s) you wish to display on your Embeddable.

name.title: Collection Name
name.description: Assign a name to the NFT Collection you intend to sell. This name will be visible on the embeddable itself.

twitter.title: Twitter URL
twitter.description: (Optional) Enter a Twitter url for this embeddable. Must begin with https://

featured.title: Featured Token Id
featured.description: (Optional) The Token ID of the CW721 NFT token(s) which you wish to display in this embeddable.
